actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Technology, Information Policy, Intergovernmental Relations and the Census.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Technology, Information Policy, Intergovernmental Relations and the Census

official_title: To reinstate the requirement that firearms dealers comply with the Freedom of Information Act by providing information about firearms purchasers.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: People's Right to Know Act - Repeals provisions of the Treasury and General Government Appropriations Act, 2003 that prohibit the use of appropriatied funds to make certain law enforcement database records available under the Freedom of Information Act with respect to incidents involving arson explosives incidents, or the tracing of a firearm.

titles.title: To reinstate the requirement that firearms dealers comply with the Freedom of Information Act by providing information about firearms purchasers.
